<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/payments/charges"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Create a new charge

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"Idempotency-Key","in":"header","description":"Idempotency key to prevent duplicate processing","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["amount","currency","payment_intent_id"],"properties":{"amount":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"description":"Amount in smallest currency unit (e.g., cents)","example":10000},"currency":{"type":"string","pattern":"^[A-Z]{3}$","description":"ISO 4217 currency code","example":"USD"},"payment_intent_id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"ID of the payment intent to charge"},"metadata":{"type":"object","description":"Additional metadata","additionalProperties":true}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
